mapper.sql: remarkschildrenId, studentName, studentSex, studentBirth, school, parentName, telephone, familyAddress, registrationChannels, registrationConsultant, startTime, endTime, remarks
mapper.insert: insert into children ( studentName, studentSex, studentBirth, school, parentName, telephone, familyAddress, registrationChannels, registrationConsultant, startTime, endTime,remarks) values ( #{studentName}, #{studentSex}, #{studentBirth}, #{school}, #{parentName}, #{telephone},#{familyAddress}, #{registrationChannels}, #{registrationConsultant}, #{startTime}, null, #{remarks});
